column3: JPja
column4: USen

column3: 賊のことについて
column4: About the thieves...

column3: アジトの場所について
column4: Where's the hideout?

column3: わかった
column4: That's all.

column3: 似合うよ
column4: It looks good!

column3: ちょっと大きすぎ…
column4: It's a tad big...

column3: もちろん
column4: Of course!

column3: ちょっと待って
column4: Give me some time...

column3: もちろん
column4: Of course!

column3: もう一度説明して
column4: The plan, once more.

column3: やっぱり出直す
column4: Um... I... Well...

column3: 神獣に乗り込みたい
column4: I can calm Naboris.

column3: もう大丈夫！
column4: I'm ready!

column3: もう一度作戦を教えて
column4: The strategy, again?

column3: 出直してきます
column4: Give me a bit...

column3: 引き返す
column4: Retreat!

column3: 続行する
column4: Keep up the fight!

column3: もちろん
column4: Of course!

column3: 今はちょっと…
column4: Er... Not right now...

column3: （最後の一撃を喰らって雄叫びを上げる）
column4: (Receives final hit and screams)

column3:
族長様ならゲルドの街に戻られたよ
ずいぶん疲弊されていたようだけど…
あれだけの激しい戦いだったんだ
無理もないだろうさ…
column4:
If you're looking for the chief, she's gone
back to Gerudo Town. She looked
absolutely exhausted.
I would be too, though. That battle
looked so intense. I hope she didn't
overdo it...

column3:
ここからじゃ何が起こったのか
わからなかったが
本当に神獣を
大人しくさせてしまうとはな…
column4:
I couldn't see all the details of what
happened out there, but I think you truly
have quieted the Divine Beast...

column3:
族長様は上にいらっしゃる

疲れておられたが
今はすっかり元気になられたようだ
あんな小さな体に大きな負担を抱えられて…
何もできない自分が歯がゆいよ…
column4:
The chief is upstairs. She was pretty
exhausted before, but it seems like
she's back to normal now.
I'm annoyed that while she risked so
much, there was nothing I could do to
help...

column3:
驚いたな…

まさか アンタみたいな
ちっこいのが来るとは…
本当に神獣と戦えるのか…？

しかし…族長様に認められたというのであれば
何か理由があるんだろうな
族長様なら この監視所のてっぺんでお待ちだ
早く行くんだな
column4:
I'm shocked... Despite what the chief
said, I wasn't expecting someone as...
short as you.
But the chief must have her reasons for
believing you can fight the Divine Beast.

She's waiting for you at the top of the
lookout post. Hurry up.

column3:
族長様なら上にいらっしゃるよ
あまりお待たせするんじゃないぞ
column4:
If you're looking for the chief, she's up
top. Don't make her wait forever.

column3:
初めて… かもしれん…

初めて わらわは自分の力で
族長としての務めを果たせた気がする…
後はお前に任せた
今 アレを鎮められるのは お前だけだからな
しかし…約束してくれ
必ず無事に帰ってくるのだぞ…
column4:
You know...this might be the first time
I've felt like I've lived up to the
expectations of being chief.
I leave the rest to you. You're the only
one who can truly calm this beast.

Just...promise me you'll come back safe.

column3: おおっ帰ってきたか？！
column4: Oh, you're back?!

column3:
無事でよかった…

本当に…
column4:
I'm glad you're OK...


Truly, I am...

column3:
ナボリスが鎮座し巨大な砂嵐も収まった…
大厄災の動向は気がかりだが…
少なくとも民がナボリスに
悩まされることは もうないだろう…
column4:
Naboris is no longer a threat to the
town...

I'm still worried about the larger threat to
Hyrule, but at least my people won't be
troubled by Naboris anymore.

column3:
かつてウルボザ様が使われていた
我が一族の珠玉の武具だ
ウルボザ様の友であったお前に
持っていてもらいたい と思ってな
column4:
These pieces of equipment are priceless
treasures of the Gerudo people.
They were once worn by Lady Urbosa.
Since you and Lady Urbosa were friends,
it's only right that you have them.

column3: これは世話になった礼だ
column4:
I want to offer you these as thanks for
your help. I trust you'll accept them.

column3:
神器を奪われてしまうとは…
この国始まって以来の失態であろうな…
ウルボザ様や先代に
合わせる顔がないわ…
民も幼き王の非力さを
実感しているのだろうな…
column4:
I can't believe my heirloom was stolen!
This is probably the most discouraging
event this town has ever seen...
I believe that Lady Urbosa and our other
ancestors must be looking down on us
with such shame right now.
I wonder if my people can tell just how
powerless their young ruler truly is...

column3:
それは違います！

神器を奪われたのは
我々護衛の失態です！
私が もっとしっかりしていれば…
column4:
My lady, do not take this crisis so
personally!

This failure rests entirely on myself and
on the soldiers tasked with protecting
the heirloom.
If only I'd been more vigilant...

column3: 苦労をかけるな ビューラ…
column4:
You needn't beat yourself up in my
stead, Buliara...

column3:
わらわは見ての通り まだ童じゃ

民の目は皆温かいが
それが わらわにとっては辛いこともある…
1日でも早く真の意味で
族長として認められねばと気負っておったが
神器を盗まれた時は 
正直目の前が真っ暗になった…
column4:
I am, as you have no doubt noticed,
still but a child.

The people look on me with nothing
but warmth in their eyes, but even this
brings me some pain, I must admit...
I've tried so hard to be worthy of their
love, to be a worthy chief...and to prove
to myself that I was worthy, too.
When my family heirloom was stolen,
I felt as though a shadow had fallen
over me...

column3:
ど…どうだ！
似合うか？
column4:
How...how is it?! 
Do I look all right?

column3: …ど どうだ？
column4: Um. How do I look?

column3:
ふふっ… なんだろうな…
戦いの前だというのに 
お前の一言で
こうも心が落ち着くとはな…
わらわは先に行っておる
街から南東にある監視所で落ち合うとしよう
column4:
Heheh, who would have thought that,
just before such a momentous battle...

hearing a simple, confident pledge of
support from you would be what puts
me at ease?
I'll head out now. Let's meet up at the
lookout post south of town.

column3: …そ そうか？
column4: I see...

column3:
神獣 ヴァ・ナボリスが徘徊している場所だが
神器を捜索している間に大きく変わった
column4:
The threat Divine Beast Vah Naboris
poses has only grown since we began
searching for the heirloom.

column3:
わらわの愛スナザラシ
パトリシアちゃんと共に待っているぞ
column4:
I'll be there waiting for you with my
favorite sand seal, Patricia.

column3:
ナボリスにはスナザラシに乗らねば近づけん

監視所は街からそう遠くないが
腕慣らしもかねてスナザラシで来るといいだろう
column4:
There's only one way to get close to
Naboris, and that's with the help of
a sand seal.
The lookout post isn't too far from town,
but you should take a sand seal there.
You can get some practice in that way.

column3:
待っておったぞ…

ふふっ…語らずともよい…

これでも このゲルドの族長だ
お前からあふれる神器の力ぐらいわかるわ
column4:
I've been waiting for you...


Oh, you needn't say a word.


As the chief of the Gerudo, I can sense
the power of the heirloom flowing from
you. I know that you've succeeded!

column3:
英傑と言えども
心の準備は必要というわけか…
わらわは先に行っておる

覚悟がきまったら
街から南東にある監視所にくるがいい
column4:
Hah... I suppose that even a Champion
such as yourself must need some time to
prepare for such a battle.
I will go on ahead. Once you have
steeled yourself, meet me at the 
lookout post south of town.

column3:
いずれ街にも危険が及ぶやもしれん

わらわは族長として… ゲルドの民として
何としてでも アレを止めねばならぬ
共に行ってくれるな？
column4:
I believe that Gerudo Town itself may
be in danger before too long...

As chief, and as a Gerudo, I must find
some way to stop that thing before it
threatens my people. Will you help me?

column3:
にしても…

やっぱり大きいな…
column4: Still... It really is a little big...

column3: …そ そうか
column4: ...You don't say.

column3:
どうした？
ぼーっとして？
それよりも…
column4:
What's wrong? You're just staring...
Anyway, what matters now is...

column3:
そんな中 お前が訪ねてきてくれたのは
ウルボザ様の お導きであろう…
さぁ…"兜をここへ…
column4:
Yes, your arrival in the midst of all of this
must be the work of Lady Urbosa...

Now, please give me the helm.

column3:
あそこでお前が撤退してくれねば
わらわも倒れておったかもしれん…
しかし わらわはもう大丈夫だ

お前はどうだ？
バクダン矢と弓の準備はいいな？
column4:
If we hadn't withdrawn, that could have
been the end for me. Don't worry, I'm
doing fine now.
How are you holding up? Don't forget to
make sure your bow isn't damaged and
that you've got enough bomb arrows.

column3:
共に力を合わせねば
アレを鎮めることはできん…
お前の準備ができるまで
ここでまっておるぞ
column4:
We can't take on the Divine Beast unless
we work together. I'll be right here until
you're ready to go.

column3:
無事に生還することが何よりも大切だ
納得するまで何度でも話してやるぞ
column4:
It is of the utmost importance that we
make it back unharmed. I can explain the
plan as many times as you like.

column3:
まずはスナザラシに乗ってアレに近づく
先導は わらわが行おう
お前は隙を見て
アレの四足をバクダン矢で撃ち抜くのだ
ナボリスは地の力を得て駆動している
そこを狙えば必ず動きを止めるはずだ
だが…

アレから放たれる落雷は凶悪だ
一撃でも喰らったら致命傷は免れられない…
この雷鳴の兜があれば落雷を退け
お前を守ることはできよう
しかし…兜の力は遠くには及ばない…

わらわから離れすぎると
お前を落雷から守ることはできん
それだけは忘れないでくれ

あとは…

傷を負い戦闘が困難になったら
この監視所まで撤退すると…約束してくれ
決して無理はするでないぞ

では最後の確認だ…

覚悟はいいか？
column4:
First, we'll use the sand seals to get in
really close to that thing. I'll take the
lead.
I'm counting on you to shoot at its feet
with your bomb arrows.

Naboris draws energy from the
ground to keep moving. If you damage
the feet, I think you can stop it.
Those lightning strikes, though...
Getting hit even once could prove fatal.

The Thunder Helm can repel the
lightning strikes, protecting me
from harm.
It can also shield a limited area around
me, so you'll have to stay close if you
don't want to be shocked.
And listen... If you're too injured to keep
fighting, promise me you'll retreat here,
to the lookout post.
Don't do anything reckless under any
circumstances.

This is the last time I will ask...
Are you ready?

column3: では行くぞ！！
column4: Let's move!

column3:
それ以上離れたら
ナボリスを見失ってしまうぞ？！
column4:
Link! If you get any farther away, you'll
lose sight of Naboris!

column3: 一度引き返すか？
column4: Do you want to retreat for now?

column3:
そうだな一度態勢を立て直そう
監視所に戻るぞ！
column4:
OK, that sounds good! Let's regroup
back at the lookout post!

column3:
狙うのは足だ！
頼んだぞ！
column4:
Aim for the feet!
You can do this!

column3:
再び神獣に挑むぞ！
覚悟はいいか？
column4:
We're going on the attack again!
Are you ready?

column3:
まぁ そう凄むな ビューラ…

この者は
ただの旅人ではないようだからの…
お前…名を何と申す？
column4:
Hold on, Buliara... This one appears to
be more than a common traveler.

You there—what is your name?

column3:
ほぅ…
リンクとな…
わらわに用があって来たのであろう？
リンクお前の話を聞こうではないか
column4:
Link... And what is it you've come all
the way here to tell me, Link?

column3:
…それに

その者が腰に着けている物は
恐らくは シーカー族の遺産であろう
彼らが あのような代物を
そう易々と流れ者に渡すとは思えん
column4:
What of the device on this one's hip?
It appears to be a precious relic of the
Sheikah.
I can't imagine they would give
something so valuable to a simple
drifter—can you?

column3:
お前も見たであろう…

巨大な砂嵐をまとい近づく者に雷を落とす
神獣 ヴァ・ナボリスの姿を…
column4:
You saw it on your way to our town.


Divine Beast Vah Naboris, cloaked in
a massive sandstorm, hurling lightning at
any who dare approach.

column3:
確か…
退魔の剣…と言ったか
ハイラルの姫が何処かの森に
封印したと聞いておるが…
column4:
They do indeed... If I recall correctly, it
was called the sword that seals the
darkness. 
The Princess of Hyrule supposedly hid it
away in a forest somewhere.

column3: なるほど…確かにな
column4: Ah, yes... An interesting suggestion.

column3:
確か…
退魔の剣…と言ったか
ハイラルの姫が
深い森の中に封印したときいているが…
column4:
They do indeed... If I recall correctly, it
was called the sword that seals the
darkness. 
The Princess of Hyrule supposedly hid it
away in the middle of a deep forest.

column3:
アレがないことには
ナボリスに近づくこともできぬからな
column4:
Without my heirloom, you'll never be
able to approach Naboris.

column3:
フフッ…
もしそうであれば大罪じゃな…
だが…
お前が英傑であるというなら話は別じゃ…
ウルボザ様の友を手荒には扱えぬからな

それにだ…
ナボリスを鎮めたいというのは こちらも同じ
column4:
A voe within our walls is a great crime.
But a voe who is a Champion...

Well, we'd never mistreat a friend of
Lady Urbosa. And if you're here to help
us with Naboris, then we are allies.

column3:
いや待てビューラ…

…母様が言っていた

100年前 ハイラルの姫が
倒れた剣士を眠りにつかせたと…
確か… その剣士は…
その者と同じ リンクという名だったはず…
にわかには信じがたいが…
column4:
Hmm... Buliara, a memory just
jumped into my head—something my
mother spoke of.
When the Calamity happened, the
princess of Hyrule placed a fallen
swordsman into a deep sleep.
That swordsman, much like our new
friend here, was named Link...though it
always seemed more legend than fact.

column3:
実はなナボリスの雷に唯一抗うことができる
ゲルド族の神器雷鳴の兜が…
あろうことか
賊どもに奪われてしまってな…
column4:
You see, there is only one thing in all of
Hyrule that can withstand the lightning
from Naboris.
The Thunder Helm, a family heirloom and
relic of the Gerudo. But as Buliara says,
it was stolen from us.

column3: フフッ…
column4: Heh, you know...

column3:
確か…
退魔の剣…と言ったか
ハイラルの姫が
迷いの森に封印したときいているが…
column4:
They do indeed... If I recall correctly, it
was called the sword that seals the
darkness. 
The Princess of Hyrule supposedly hid it
away in the Lost Woods.

column3:
それにしても こんな珍客が訪ねてくるとは…
これもウルボザ様のお導きかのぅ
column4:
I take heart in having such a rare visitor
as yourself. Lady Urbosa must be
looking out for us.

column3:
…だが

その者が腰に着けている物は
恐らくは シーカー族の遺産であろう
彼らが あのような代物を
そう易々と流れ者に渡すとは思えん
column4:
What of the device on this one's hip?
It appears to be a precious relic of the
Sheikah.
I can't imagine they would give
something so valuable to a simple
drifter—can you?

column3:
どうにかしてアレを止めねばならぬが

我々だけでは
アレを鎮めることは出来ぬ…
お前が英傑というのであれば
中に入りナボリスを鎮めてきてはくれぬか
column4:
We have to do something to stop it, but
we have yet to find any way to appease
the Divine Beast on our own.
If you truly are a Champion, perhaps you
will be able to enter Naboris and
calm its anger.

column3:
見えるか…？
神獣 ヴァ・ナボリスは目前だ
しかし アレに近づくためには
スナザラシを使わねばならぬが…
覚悟はいいか？
column4:
What a sight. Divine Beast Vah Naboris
is pretty intimidating...

If we want to get close enough to that
thing, we'll need to use sand seals...
Are you ready?

column3:
わらわの力だけでは
アレを鎮めることはできん…
お前の力が必要なのだ
覚悟ができるまで ここでまっておるぞ
column4:
I can't do this all on my own, so I'll wait
until you're sure you're ready.

column3: ふふっ… そうでないとな
column4:
Feeling confident? Good. Let's get
going, then!

column3:
まずはスナザラシに乗ってアレに近づく
先導は わらわが行おう
お前は隙を見て
アレの四足をバクダン矢で撃ち抜くのだ
ナボリスは地の力を得て駆動している
そこを狙えば必ず動きを止めるはずだ
だが…

アレから放たれる落雷は凶悪だ
一撃でも喰らったら致命傷は免れられない…
column4:
First, we'll use the sand seals to get in
really close to that thing. I'll take the
lead.
I'm counting on you to shoot at its feet
with bomb arrows.

Naboris draws energy from the
ground to keep moving. If you damage
the feet, I think you can stop it.
Those lightning strikes, though...
Getting hit even once could prove fatal.

column3:
この雷鳴の兜があれば落雷を退け
お前を守ることはできよう
しかし…兜の力は遠くには及ばない…

わらわから離れすぎると
お前を落雷から守ることはできん
それだけは忘れないでくれ

あとは…

傷を負い戦闘が困難になったら
この監視所まで撤退すると約束してくれ
決して無理はするでないぞ
column4:
The Thunder Helm can repel the
lightning strikes, protecting me
from harm.
But it can also shield a limited area
around me...

You'll have to stay close if you don't
want to be shocked.

And listen... If you're too injured to keep
fighting, promise me you'll retreat here,
to the lookout post.
Don't do anything reckless under any
circumstances.

column3:
無事に生還することが何よりも大切だ
納得するまで何度でも話してやるぞ
column4:
It is of the utmost importance that we
make it back unharmed. I can explain the
plan as many times as you like.

column3:
わらわの力だけでは
アレを鎮めることはできん…
お前の力が必要なのだ
覚悟ができるまで ここでまっておるぞ
column4:
I can't take on this Divine Beast on my
own, so I'll wait until you're sure
you're ready.

column3: …さて少し離れてくれるか？
column4:
Could you give me a bit of room, just
for a moment?

column3:
我が名は ルージュ！
正統なる ゲルド王家の末裔なり
神獣 ヴァ・ナボリスを鎮めんがため
今こそ神器の力にすがる時が来た
column4:
My name is Riju, descendant of the royal
line and leader of the Gerudo people!

With the power of the heirloom passed
down in my family, I shall calm the
Divine Beast Vah Naboris.

column3:
おお… これが神器の力か…
力が…力がみなぎってくる
column4:
Oh, wow! I can feel their power coursing
through me!

column3: では行くぞ！！
column4: Let's move!

column3:
ウルボザ様…
どうか リンクと わらわをお護りください…
column4:
Lady Urbosa... Please grant Link and me
your protection...

column3:
ゲルドの始祖達よ！
雷をもって我が声に応えたまえ…！！
column4:
Ancestors of the Gerudo!
Answer my call! Aid me in this task!

column3:
ほぅ…
それがお前の真の姿か…
ふふっ…
街の中では見れぬ姿だな…
column4:
Well then... That's what you really look
like, huh...

Hehe... With voe banned from town, it's
not very common for me to see someone
like you.

column3:
では最後の確認だ…

覚悟はいいか？
column4:
This is the last time I'll ask...
Are you ready?

column3:
これは わらわのバクダン矢だ
少ないが使うがよい
column4:
Here are some Gerudo bomb arrows.
There aren't many, so be sure to put
them to good use.

column3:
…まて

バクダン矢が少ないようだが…
本当にそれで向かう気か？
わらわも もう持っていないぞ…

バクダン矢は街で買える代物だ
装備をもう少し整えたほうが良いと思うがな…
column4:
Hang on a second...


You don't have a lot of bomb arrows.
Are you really planning on going out
like that?
I haven't got any on me to give to you...


You can buy bomb arrows in town. I
think it'd be a good idea to stock up a
bit before this fight...

column3:
…まて

バクダン矢が少ないようだが…
本当にそれで向かう気か？
予備のバクダン矢であったが…
これを使うがよい
column4:
Hang on a second...


You don't have a lot of bomb arrows.
Are you really planning on going out
like that?
I was hanging on to these as an
emergency supply. Looks like we
needed them!

column3:
…まて

バクダン矢が少ないようだが…
本当にそれで向かう気か？
わらわのバクダン矢も これで最後だが…
そなたに託そう
column4:
...Wait.


You don't have a lot of bomb arrows.
Are you really planning on going out
like that?
These were basically my emergency,
emergency supply. I entrust them to you,
but that really is all I've got!

column3:
アナタ…
こんな所でなにしてるの？
ここは雷鳴の兜を奪った賊のアジトよ！

奴らに見つかったら仲間を呼ばれて
いっかんの終わりよ
せめて奴らの気を引く何かがあれば
いいんだけど…
アイツら警備してるかバナナ食べてるか位で
他に ぜんぜん隙をみせないのよね…
ともかくここは危険な場所よ
私は自分で何とかするから
アナタは早く逃げて！
column4:
Hey, what are you doing here? This is
the hideout of those Yiga thieves who
stole the Thunder Helm...
If they spot you, they'll call their friends
for sure. There's no way you can take
them all on.
If only you had some way of distracting
them...but I don't know how.

All I ever see them do is patrol and eat
bananas. I haven't seen anything else
that you could exploit as a weakness.
Listen, this place is dangerous.
You should get out of here while you
can. I can take care of myself.

column3:
アナタ…
まだ逃げてないの？
奴らに見つかったら仲間を呼ばれて
いっかんの終わりよ
アイツら警備してるかバナナ食べてるか位で
ぜんぜん隙をみせないし…
私は自分で何とかするから
アナタは早く逃げて！
column4:
Why haven't you escaped yet?


If anyone spots you, they'll call their
friends for sure. There's no way you can
take them all on.
All I ever see them do is patrol and eat
bananas. I haven't seen anything else
that you could exploit as a weakness.
Like I said, this place is dangerous.
You should get out of here while you
can. I can take care of myself.

column3: 何とかして逃げないと
column4: Gotta escape somehow...

column3:
族長様に もしものことがあったらと
居てもたっても いられなかったが…
いらぬ心配だったようだな

いつの間にか族長様は
本当の族長様に なられていたんだな…
column4:
I was so worried that something horrible
would happen to the chief, I could barely
contain myself.
But it seems like I had nothing to worry
about.

Actually...and maybe I'm seeing things...
but it really looks like the chief has
grown into a true leader.

column3:
本当によくやってくれたな…

我々に力になれる事があれば
なんでも言ってくれ
column4:
You did it. You really did it.
Please... Let me know if there is anything
at all I can do to help you from now on.

column3:
どうした？

英傑というのであれば
神器の奪還など簡単なことだろう
column4:
What's wrong? If you truly are the
Champion of legend, recovering the
chief's heirloom should be simple.

column3:
賊どものことなら
まずは隊長のチークに話を聞くがいい
その階段を下りた先にいるはずだ
column4:
If you want to know more about the
thieves, then you should speak to
Captain Teake.
Just head down those stairs.

column3:
お前の腕前
見せてもらおうじゃないか
column4:
Use this chance to show us what you're
capable of!

column3:
ルージュ様なら2階だ

それにしても貴様なんかを
寝屋に通すとは…
ルージュ様は一体何を考えてらっしゃるのか…

いいか！

ルージュ様に何かしたら
貴様 タダでは済まさんぞ！
column4:
If you are looking for Lady Riju, she's
on the second floor.

Normally people aren't allowed into
her sleeping quarters, but she has given
you permission it seems...
Be on your best manners. If she deems
you to be a disturbance to her, it will not
end well for you!

column3:
ルージュ様は最初から
お前のことをわかってらっしゃったのだな…
人を見る目はあると思っていたんだが

私もまだまだだな…

さぁ宮殿の守りは私に任せ
お前は監視所に急ぐがいい
ルージュ様を頼んだぞ…
column4:
Lady Riju could tell who you were—what
you were capable of—all along.

I thought I was a good judge of
character, but clearly I still have a ways
to go.
Leave the town's defenses to me.
Lady Riju needs you at the lookout post.

column3:
本当に兜を取り戻してくるとはな…

数々の無礼許してくれ…

国を… ルージュ様をお守りするため
槍の腕を磨いてきたが
神獣との戦いに私は無力…
今はお前に頼るしかないようだ
さあ急ぎ監視所へ向かうのだ！

ルージュ様を頼んだぞ
column4:
Truth be told, I didn't think you'd make it
back with the helm. I can only offer my
apologies for doubting you.
I've dedicated my life to protecting Lady
Riju and the Gerudo people, but against
this Divine Beast...I'm powerless.
It's up to you and Lady Riju. She's
waiting for you at the lookout post.
Please take care of her.

column3:
ヴォーイだっ！ ヴォーイがいるぞ！
捕えろ！！
column4:
Sound the alarm! A voe has been
detected! Capture him at once!

column3:
街に ヴォーイを入れるわけにはいかない
それがゲルドの掟なのだ
わかったか？！
もうここには来るんじゃないぞ！
column4:
Voe are forbidden from entering this
town. This is Gerudo law. Do you
understand?
Never come back!

column3:
また貴様か…

街に ヴォーイを入れるわけにはいかないと
言っているだろう！
わかったな？！
もうここには二度と来るんじゃないぞ！
column4:
You again... How many times must I tell
you—voe are not allowed within the
town walls!
You understand that you're a voe, right?
Do NOT return!

column3:
貴様という奴は…
懲りずに何度も何度も…
街にヴォーイを入れるわけにはいかない
それがゲルドの掟だと言ってるだろう！
もうここには
一生来るんじゃないぞ！！
column4:
Why, you pesky little... When will you
learn? No voe are allowed within the
town! It's a rule of the Gerudo!
Do not come back here! Not ever!

column3:
隊長から お前に協力するように言われたが
今わかっていることは これだけなんだ
column4:
Our captain has instructed me to
cooperate with you on this, but our info
isn't entirely complete...

column3:
賊どもはイーガ団と名乗る手練れ共でな
変装に長け高度な隠密技術を持っているんだ
今回の件も闇夜に乗じて この宮殿に忍び入り
神器を奪うと煙のように消えたという
その昔王家を追われ悪に寝返った
シーカー族の末裔らしいんだが
それにしてもなぜ雷鳴の兜を…
column4:
These thieves are highly skilled in both
stealth and disguise. They refer to
themselves as the Yiga.
They slipped into town in the dark of
night, stole the chief's heirloom, and
vanished like smoke in the wind.
We believe them to be descendants of
the Sheikah tribe that splintered and
turned to villainy.
But why would they want to steal the
Thunder Helm?

column3:
カルサー谷に
賊どものアジトがある事は わかっているんだが
谷の道は険しくてな…

スナザラシに乗って
何度も侵入を試みてはいるんだが
まだ踏み込めてはいない状況なんだ

砂漠で他の部族に後れを取るなど
恥ずかしい限りだ…
column4:
We know that the thieves' hideout is in
Karusa Valley. The path through the
valley is very difficult...
Despite repeated attempts to infiltrate
the hideout, we haven't yet managed to
set foot inside.
Painful though it is to admit, it seems
possible that some other group of
desert dwellers has bested us.

column3:
昼夜問わずに調査はしているのだが…
今わかっていることは これだけなんだ
column4:
We're continuing our investigation
through the heat of day and the cold of
night. So far, we know...

column3:
アジトの場所がわからなくなったら
北西門の門番に聞いてみるんだな
北西門はこの兵舎をでて左手だ

本当は案内してやりたいところだが
こちらもトラブルばかりでな…
まったく…
何から手を付けていいのやら…
column4:
Ask the guard at the northwest gate to
point you toward the hideout.

The northwest gate is on the left as you
exit these barracks.

I'd walk you over there if I could, but
there is always trouble to deal with
here...
Sometimes, I don't even know which
crisis to deal with first...

column3:
賊どもはイーガ団と名乗る手練れ共でな
変装に長け高度な隠密技術を持っているんだ
今回の件も闇夜に乗じて この宮殿に忍び入り
神器を奪うと煙のように消えたという
その昔王家を追われ悪に寝返った
シーカー族の末裔らしいんだが
それにしてもなぜ雷鳴の兜を…
column4:
These thieves are highly skilled in both
stealth and disguise. They refer to
themselves as the Yiga.
They slipped into town in the dark of
night, stole the chief's heirloom, and
vanished like smoke in the wind.
We believe them to be descendants of
the Sheikah tribe that splintered and
turned to villainy.
But why would they want to steal the
Thunder Helm?

column3:
カルサー谷に
賊どものアジトがある事は わかっているんだが
谷の道は険しくてな…

スナザラシに乗って
何度も侵入を試みてはいるんだが
まだ踏み込めてはいない状況なんだ

砂漠で他の部族に後れを取るなど
まったく恥ずかしい限りだ…
column4:
We know that the thieves' hideout is in
Karusa Valley. The path through the
valley is very difficult...
Despite repeated attempts to infiltrate
the hideout, we haven't yet managed to
set foot inside.
Painful though it is to admit, it seems
possible that some other group of
desert dwellers has bested us.

column3:
おい バレッタの姿が見えないが
アイツはどうした？
column4:
Hey, I haven't seen Barta. Where's she
gone off to?

column3:
バレッタちゃんなら賊のアジトを覗いてくる！
…って はりきって出かけて行きました！
でも… どうしたんでしょう？
もう2日も帰ってきませんね…
column4:
She said she was going to scout the
thieves' hideout, but then she left
before we could say anything.
Now that I think about it, she's been
gone for two days. I wonder what
happened to her...

column3:
バ… バ… バカモノッ…！！

なぜ単独で行かせたのだ…！
しかも なぜ2日間も報告せんのだっ！！
column4:
You— Are you serious?!


Why did you let her go by herself?!
And why did you wait two days to
report this?!

column3:
も…申し訳ありません…
ちょっと見に行くだけって言ってたので…
まぁ大丈夫かなぁ～と…
column4:
I'm— I apologize... She said she just
wanted to check it out and would be
careful, so I thought...

column3:
ぐぬぬ…神器の捜索だけでなく
バレッタの捜索まで しなければならんとは…！
こんな失態が隊長の耳に入ったら
ゲルド砂漠100周の刑は免れられんぞ…！
column4:
Uuugghhh. As if we aren't busy enough
searching for the chief's heirloom, now
we have to find Barta too...
If the captain hears about this fiasco,
she'll punish us for sure! Probably 100
laps around Gerudo Desert...again.

column3: あの…我々はどうしたら…？
column4: Oh... Oh, no. What should we do?

column3: 今考えているところだっ！！
column4: I'm thinking about it!

column3:
ゲルド族の長ルージュ様の御前であるぞ！
用があるなら そこから申すがよい！
column4:
You stand before Lady Riju, chief
of the Gerudo! Declare your business,
but come no closer!

column3:
ナボリスに乗り込みたいだと？

アレを制御できるのは
ウルボザ様と同じく英傑と呼ばれる者だけ
しかも皆 100年前の大厄災で
命を落とされている
何をバカなことを…
column4:
You think you have what it takes to
subdue something so powerful as a
Divine Beast?
The only ones who could ever control
them were Champions like Lady Urbosa.

And all of the Champions died in the
Calamity 100 years ago.

column3: まさか貴様！ヴォーイ…
column4: Wait a moment... You're a voe!

column3:
しかし…
まだその者の正体もはっきりせぬまま
そのような重大なことを任せるというのは
如何なものかと…
column4:
Lady Riju! I don't see how you can trust
a complete stranger with something as
important as this task.

column3:
神器を盗んだ賊に関しては
兵士達が詳しく知っている
column4:
Our soldiers can tell you all you need to
know about the thieves who stole Lady
Riju's heirloom.

column3:
し… しかし

ハイリアの英傑は伝説の剣を携えていた
と聞いています
この者は それらしき物を
持っていないようですが…
column4:
But, Lady Riju! Do those same stories
not also say that the Hylian Champion
carried a legendary sword?
I see no such weapon in this person's
care.

column3:
まずは その先の兵舎にいる
隊長のチークから話を聞くのがいいだろう
column4:
Head through this arch. It will lead you
to the barracks. Then, seek out Captain
Teake, and ask for a full report.

column3:
ただそうなれば…英傑の中に
ハイリア人のヴァーイはいなかったはず…
column4:
...I don't remember ever hearing of
a Hylian vai among the Champions.

column3:
ご心配なさらずとも
本当に英傑だというのであれば
簡単に取り戻してくれましょう
column4:
You needn't worry, Lady Riju. If he truly
is a Champion, this should be an easy
task for him.

column3:
…まずは どうでしょう？
兜の奪還をその者に頼むというのは…
column4:
Perhaps if this person were first to prove
his worth by recovering your stolen
Thunder Helm...
